document.full_text: abboud al-zumar went to jail 30 years ago for his role in killing egyptian president anwar sadat. now a free man, he believes democracy will prevent islamists from ever again taking up the gun against the state.
document.title: in free egypt, jihad leader says time for gun is over
lines_and_colors: abboud al-zumar went to jail 30 years ago for his role in killing egyptian president anwar sadat. now a free man, he believes democracy will prevent islamists from ever again taking up the gun against the state.
